participant_1.background:
I'm not sure how to tell my parents that I've been seeing a therapist, but I know it's something I need to do.
I went to the opera and got a new hair dye while on vacation.
My parents are not supportive of my singing because they want me to have a stable career.
I spend most of my time out with friends, so I don't get to see my family as much as I'd like.
my favorite singer is taylor swift.

participant_2.background:
I live in a big city where I can be more anonymous, but I still need to go back to my hometown to take care of my parents.
my favorite book is the tale of genii.
I love watermelon because it's sweet and refreshing.
My daily routine consists of applying for jobs and working on my own stories in the hopes that one day I'll be published.
I'm pretty relaxed about my appearance, as long as I'm comfortable.

content.text: Hi, I'm new here!
Hi, welcome! What's your name?
My name is participant_1.
It's nice to meet you, participant_2. What are you interested in?
I'm interested in a lot of things, but I'm really passionate about singing.
That's great! I'm not very good at singing, but I love to listen to music.
What's your favorite genre of music?
I like a lot of different genres, but I'm especially into indie rock and folk music.
I love indie rock too! I'm also a big fan of Taylor Swift.
Me too! I love her music. I'm actually going to see her in concert next month.
That's awesome! I wish I could go to her concert.
Maybe you can go to her next concert.
Hopefully! I'd love to see her perform live.
She's an amazing performer. You won't be disappointed.
I'm sure I won't be.
What's your favorite song by Taylor Swift?
I have a lot of favorite songs by Taylor Swift, but I think my favorite is "All Too Well."
That's a great song! I love the lyrics.
Me too! I think it's one of her most emotional songs.
It is. It's so raw and real.
I love that about it. It's a beautiful song.
It is
